text: Gwen Margolis (October 4, 1934 – June 9, 2020) was an American Democratic politician. She was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Margolis was a member of the Florida Senate from 1980 to 1992, 2002 to 2008, and 2010 to 2016. She was Senate President for the 1990 to 1992 term. She was a member of the Florida House of Representatives from 1974 to 1980. Margolis died on June 9, 2020 in Miami, Florida of natural causes at the age of 85.Florida’s first woman Senate president, Gwen Margolis, dies at 85 ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Philadelphia Category:Politicians from Miami Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Gwen Margolis
